dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Complaint about your customer - Owner of tiklaizle.com]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 18, 2006 5:41 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; admin@reklamlar.tv
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Complaint about your customer - Owner of
tiklaizle.com]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Complaint about your customer - Owner of tiklaizle.com
Date: Wed, 18 Jan 2006 06:47:17 +0200
From: admin@reklamlar.tv
To: info@cheapestwebhosting.biz
CC: abuse@theplanet.com


Dear Sir/Madam,

Tiklaizle.com web site is currently hosted on one of your servers. Owner of
tiklaizle.com has stolen content (videos) from our site, and has published
them on his site without our consent. Even though we have repeatedly asked
the owner to remove this content from his site, he refused to do so. On top
of refusing to take necessary actions, he also replied in a very rude manner
(not to mention the curse words and swearing he used in his e-mails).

If you go to tiklaizle.com website, you can see the video playing on the
index page. If you look at this video file, you will see that it has our
site's logo (our site is located at: http://www.reklamlar.tv), and also you
can see our domain name very clearly at the bottom-right of the movie he
placed on tiklaizle.com. Furthermore, he stole multiple videos and he is
displaying them one after another.

Although all the communication between us and the owner tiklaizle.com is in
Turkish, we can still present the e-mails between us if necessary.

As you know, he does not have a right to do so without our consent, and it
is your responsibility to make sure that people do not commit illegal
actions on your servers.

Can you please take necessary steps to have him remove this content from his
site?

Thank you for your cooperation,
Reklamlar.tv


- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDztHwvK/XpJs6oyURAqqGAJ920J9GiJ1sm1Q8TFxoH7mEs24rVACfaPBm
F7xKK2cD+rXYAUUlUrALljA=
=Gh98
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
